text: Mary Tyler "Molly" Ivins (August 30, 1944-January 31, 2007) was an American journalist, author and political commentator. She worked for numerous newspapers, including the Minneapolis Star Tribune. She was the writer of many books. She died of severe breast cancer. In 2005, Ivins received the Courage in Journalism Award. ==References== Category:American journalists Category:1944 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American political commentators
title: Molly Ivins
